articles.title: Australian scientists to power Tesla on 15000km trip with printed solar panels - CNA

GOSFORTH, Australia: Scientists in Australia are testing printed solar panels they will use to power a Tesla on a 15,100km journey beginning in September, which they hope will get the public thinking about steps to help avert climate change.

Printed solar is a lightweight, laminated PET plastic that can be made at a cost of less than US$10 a square metre.
